title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: Statement that ∆S0 is negative 1 point is earned for:3 moles of gas → 2 moles of gas plus solid, (3 moles → 2 moles earns no points) OR, 2 gases → 1 gas + solid.

OR, use of ∆G0 - ∆H0 - T∆S0 with ∆G0 → 0
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for: Statement that ∆S0 is negative

1 point is earned for:3 moles of gas → 2 moles of gas plus solid, (3 moles → 2 moles earns no points) OR, 2 gases → 1 gas + solid.

OR, use of ∆G0 - ∆H0 - T∆S0 with ∆G0 → 0

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for: Statement that ∆S0 is negative

1 point is earned for:3 moles of gas → 2 moles of gas plus solid, (3 moles → 2 moles earns no points) OR, 2 gases → 1 gas + solid.

OR, use of ∆G0 - ∆H0 - T∆S0 with ∆G0 → 0

The student response earns two of the following points:

1 point is earned for: Statement that ∆S0 is negative

1 point is earned for:3 moles of gas → 2 moles of gas plus solid, (3 moles → 2 moles earns no points) OR, 2 gases → 1 gas + solid.

OR, use of ∆G0 - ∆H0 - T∆S0 with ∆G0 → 0

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: ∆G0 is less negative, goes to 0, goes +, gets larger

1 point is earned for: Explanation using ∆G0 - ∆H0 - T∆S0
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for: ∆G0 is less negative, goes to 0, goes +, gets larger

1 point is earned for: Explanation using ∆G0 - ∆H0 - T∆S0

The student response earns two of the following points:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: Keq decreases (exponent → more negative) as T increases

OR,

Keq goes from > 1, to 1, to <1 as T increases

1 point is earned for: Correct explanation using the equation ∆G0 = -RT ln Keq

Or,

higher T favors the reverse reaction ( Le Chatelier) because the forward reaction is exothermic

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: Since ∆G0 = 0 at the point, the equation is T = ∆H0 /∆S0

(∆G0 - ∆H0 - T∆S0 is not sufficient without ∆G0 = 0)

1 point is earned for: Prediction is not exact because ∆H0 and or ∆S0 vary with T
